description:
A continuation of the Fin range the Lockers are unexampled in their approach to a traditional need for a team. The strong design creates full flexibility in the workspace. Typically the first and last thing used in the working day, the Lockers are more than just storage. Brands can build team zones or position as a hub for the business, making it a go-to space for everyone. Like the Fin Bookshelf units can be grouped together or act as standalone pieces, expect to see the Fin range expand in the coming months. See the Fin Lockers in action at [Greenpeace's London HQ](https://www.opendesk.cc/workspaces/greenpeace) ## How to buy
#### [Managing it Yourself? Get quotes from a local maker »](https://www.opendesk.cc/open/fin/fin-bookshelf/get-it-made) **£710 - 860** from a [maker near you](https://www.opendesk.cc/open/fin/fin-bookshelf/get-it-made) _Of which a proportion supports the designer, and keeps the platform ticking! [(find out more about how it works »)](https://www.opendesk.cc/designs/how-it-works)._ _PLEASE NOTE: Pricing varies based on your location and local maker capacity._
---
#### [Need additional help planning? Opendesk can help! »](https://www.opendesk.cc/workspaces/lets-fit-you-out) [Opendesk can help you](mailto:sales@opendesk.cc) specify designs, visualise your new space, obtain quotes and manage your project from start to finish. All products bought through Opendesk include a 12-month guarantee. Current UK pricing for this product & service (again including support for the designer and platform): **£785** **[REQUEST CALL BACK](https://www.opendesk.cc/workspaces/lets-fit-you-out)** _This service is only available in the UK at the moment, if you are outside the UK you can connect to a local maker near you. The price is based on recent UK maker quotes. Excludes VAT, delivery and assembly._
name: Fin Lockers
